Question: The next year, this person landed a lead role on the ABC television pilot of Bosom Buddies, playing the role of Kip Wilson.
Hints: This person' next role—astronaut and commander Jim Lovell, in the 1995 film Apollo 13—reunited him with Ron Howard.
Later that year, this person starred in the Disney/Pixar animated blockbuster, Toy Story, as the voice of the toy Sheriff Woody.
The same year, this person and his wife Rita Wilson produced the hit movie My Big Fat Greek Wedding.
